title: Determinants of knowledge and perception about menopause among Saudi women: A cross-sectional study
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Amani Osman Abdelmola, Rufaydah Mohammad Mesawa, Alia'a Mohammed Hakami, Razan Faiez Ageeli, Ola Abdo Khawaji, Halimah Mohammed Ageeli, Zainab Mohammed Alabood, Hadi Dhafer Hassan Kariri, Siddig Ibrahim Abdelwahab
